Relation Type makes use of
Related Metaphor LIFE IS A JOURNEY
Description

Entailments:

Target Entailment Choosing a particular alternative of several available alternatives
Source Inference Choosing a particular path of several available paths
Type of Inferential Structure
Entailed Metaphor(s) CHOOSING AN ALTERNATIVE IS CHOOSING ONE AVAILABLE PATH

Examples:

Example Text: He started going down a bad life path.
